polyglot âˆž

A python package and command-line tools for translating documents and webpages to various markup languages and document formats (html, epub, mobi ..).

Here’s a summary of what’s included in the python package:

Classes

polyglot.authenticate Authenticate against readability api
polyglot.ebook The worker class for the ebook module
polyglot.htmlCleaner A parser/cleaner to strip a webpage article of all cruft and neatly present it with some nice css
polyglot.kindle Send documents or webpage articles to a kindle device or app
polyglot.printpdf PDF printer
polyglot.markdown.kindle_notebook convert the HTML export of kindle notebooks (from kindle apps) to markdown
polyglot.utKit.utKit Override dryx utKit

Functions
